medical_history.chief_complaint: 1 week history of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began 1 week ago and continued intermittently, intensifying this morning. The patient reports additional left-sided back pain which does not radiate. The pain did not improve with morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history includes parathyroidectomy. Allergies: alendronate, sulfamethexole, mobic, zometa. No other significant past medical history specified.
